p: A generalized linear model was fitted to the Malthusian growth rate and the log value of viral load data. Post hoc analysis of pairwise comparisons via Bonferroni correction were used to test for differences between hosts at 45 dpi ( P < 5.56 × 10 −3) or along the time course of viral infections ( P < 0.010 or 6.25 × 10 −3).
